sections.name: Output Fields
rules: Use the following field order: Title, Description, Acceptance Criteria, Story Points, Tags

sections.name: Title
rules: Indicate the task or change clearly

sections.name: Story Points
rules: Provide a rationale tied to delivery effort
Factor in coordination, dependencies, and rework

sections.name: Tags
rules: Ensure tag content reflects the story scope

sections.name: Styling and Behaviour
rules: Expect all values to be provided by the user
Keep output free of embedded examples
Reference logic externally using artefacts only
Maintain strict tone. Avoid helper language, introductions, or guidance phrasing.
